name: Rocket Rush (itch) (BrokenMirror)
description:
Without the ability to control your limbs will you be able to reach the exit?  Created for GMTK Jam 2020 with the theme Out of Control, you will have to use the chaotic force of a rocket launcher to propel yourself around the level.  

  • Move by using the explosions from your rocket launcher
  • Avoid the spikes
  • Land on top of the green platform to continue

CONTROLS:

  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click / "R" to restart
  • Escape to return to menu

CREDITS

  • Created by Navras Kamal and Darian Weibe Neufeld
  • RPG Plus Shrapnel Sounds - Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/2075-RPG-Plus-Shrapnel.html)
